alert.note: Alert for Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 2:35PM CDT until May 14 at 10:12AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cibolo Creek Near Falls City affecting Karnes County. San Antonio River Near Elmendorf affecting Wilson and Bexar Counties. San Antonio River near Floresville affecting Karnes and Wilson Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Texas... Medina River At Hwy 281 affecting Bexar County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cibolo Creek Near Falls City. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding of crop and pastureland damages irrigation pumps and any equipment near the channel. Livestock are cut off in low areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM CDT Saturday was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 18.7 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Cibolo Creek Falls City 17.0 18.4 Sat 2 pm CDT 10.2 4.8 3.1 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 330 PM CDT.
